scene1.title: Welcome to Your Journey
scene1.subtitle: A place of calm in life's chaos
scene1.description: Transform uncertainty into peace of mind with our gentle guidance.

scene2.title: The Box of Certainty
scene2.subtitle: What matters most to your family?
scene2.description: Imagine a box where you can safely store everything important for your loved ones - documents, memories, guidance, and love.
scene2.prompt: What would you put in this special box for your family?
scene2.placeholder: Write anything: house keys, banking hint, letter for my daughter, grandpa's watch, photo from our wedding, recipe for mom's cookies...

validation.required: Please share what's important to your family
validation.minLength: Please tell us a bit more (at least 10 characters)

scene3.title: The Key of Trust
scene3.subtitle: Who holds the key to your heart?
scene3.description: This special key will be engraved with a name - someone you trust completely, who would care for what matters to you.
scene3.prompt: Whose name should we engrave on your key?

keyPreview.title: Your Key
keyPreview.description: This key symbolizes the trust and love you have for this person.

validation.required: Please enter a name for your key

scene4.title: Preparing Your Path
scene4.subtitle: Creating your personal sanctuary
scene4.description: Sofia, your gentle guide, is lighting the way to your peaceful garden of memories and certainty.

firefly.message: I'm here to guide you every step of the way...

completion.title: Your sanctuary is ready
completion.description: Welcome to your Legacy Garden - a place of peace where your family's future grows brighter with every small step you take.
